description: A representation of the data stored inside of the curses.json file

curses.description: an array containing all recognized curse-words

helpMessage.description: contains the message printed out when a user issues the '?help' command to curse-bot

curseFreeMessage.description: message printed when a user curse total is requested and they have not cursed

userMessages.description: an object containing all of the user-specific curse word messsages

serverMessages.description: an object containing all server-specific curse word messages
